          <title>
            <string language="sl">Huygensov princip in lom svetlobe</string>
            <string language="en">Huygens' Principle and Refraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundregel und Brechung Huygens'</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le principe et la réfraction de Huygens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Princípio e refraction de Huygens'</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Principio e rifrazione del Huygens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχή και διάθλαση Huygens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Principio y refracción de Huygens</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prehod svetlobe med dvema različnima snovema in lomni kot.</string>
            <string language="en">Refraction of light when passesing from one medium to another and angle of refraction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">huygensov princip</string>
            <string language="en">huygens' principle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lom svetlobe</string>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung des Lichtes beim Passesing von einem 
Medium zu einem anderen und vom Brechungswinkel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réfraction de lumière passesing d'un support à 
l'autre et d'angle de la réfraction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction da luz ao passesing de um media ao 
outro e de ângulo de refraction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione di luce quando passesing da un media 
all'un altro e dall'angolo di rifrazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση του φωτός κατά passesing από ένα μέσο 
στο ένα άλλο και τη γωνία της διάθλασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción de la luz al passesing a partir de un 
media a otro y del ángulo de la refracción.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
